verses.name: Job 12:11
verses.text: Doth not the ear try words? and the mouth taste his meat?

verses.name: Job 12:12
verses.text: With the ancient is wisdom; and in length of days understanding.

verses.name: Job 12:13
verses.text: With him is wisdom and strength, he hath counsel and understanding.

verses.name: Job 12:14
verses.text: Behold, he breaketh down, and it cannot be built again: he shutteth up a man, and there can be no opening.

verses.name: Job 12:15
verses.text: Behold, he withholdeth the waters, and they dry up: also he sendeth them out, and they overturn the earth.

verses.name: Job 12:16
verses.text: With him is strength and wisdom: the deceived and the deceiver are his.

verses.name: Job 12:17
verses.text: He leadeth counsellors away spoiled, and maketh the judges fools.
